  • Method Details

    • formatGenericTemplate

      public static String formatGenericTemplate(String name, String type, List<JApiGenericType> genericTypes, boolean shorten)
      Formats a generic template.
      Parameters:
      name - The generic template name.
      type - The type extended by the generic template.
      genericTypes - The generic types of the generic template.
      shorten - Whether to truncate types to 32 characters or not.
      Returns:
      A string with the format "NAME extends TYPE<GENERIC TYPES>".

    • formatTypeName

      public static String formatTypeName(String typeName, List<JApiGenericType> genericTypes, int maxLength)
      Formats a Java type in FQN form plus generic types.
      Parameters:
      typeName - The fully qualified type name to format.
      genericTypes - The possibly empty list of generic types.
      maxLength - The maximum number of characters that will be produced. If greater or equal to 3, the FQN will be truncated to its simple name, and surplus characters will be replaced with the ellipsis character.
      Returns:
      The formatted type.

    • formatTypeName

      public static String formatTypeName(String typeName, JApiHasChangeStatus hasChangeStatus, JApiHasGenericTemplates hasGenericTemplates, int maxLength)
      Formats a Java type in FQN form plus generic templates.
      Parameters:
      typeName - The fully qualified type name to format.
      hasChangeStatus - The element that has a change status.
      hasGenericTemplates - The element that has generic templates.
      maxLength - The maximum number of characters that will be produced. If greater or equal to 3, the FQN will be truncated to its simple name, and surplus characters will be replaced with the ellipsis character.
      Returns:
      The formatted type.

    • formatTypeName

      public static String formatTypeName(String type, List<JApiGenericType> genericTypes, boolean shorten)
      Formats a Java type in FQN form plus generic types.
      Parameters:
      type - The fully qualified name to format.
      genericTypes - The possibly empty list of generic types.
      shorten - Whether to truncate the type to 32 characters or not.
      Returns:
      The formatted type.

    • formatTypeName

      public static String formatTypeName(String typeName, JApiHasChangeStatus hasChangeStatus, JApiHasGenericTemplates hasGenericTemplates, boolean shorten)
      Formats a Java type in FQN form plus generic templates.
      Parameters:
      typeName - The fully qualified type name to format.
      hasChangeStatus - The element that has a change status.
      hasGenericTemplates - The element that has generic templates.
      shorten - Whether to truncate the type to 32 characters or not.
      Returns:
      The formatted type.

    • formatParameterTypeName

      public static String formatParameterTypeName(JApiBehavior method, JApiParameter parameter, Optional<VarargsModifier> varargs, List<JApiGenericType> genericTypes, boolean shorten)
      Formats a parameter type plus generic types.
      Parameters:
      method - The method this parameter belongs to.
      parameter - The parameter whose type will be formatted.
      varargs - The varargs modifier of the method.
      genericTypes - The possibly empty list of generic types.
      shorten - Whether to truncate the type to 32 characters or not.
      Returns:
      The formatted type.
